The northern lasse a comoedie. As it hath beene often acted with good applause, at the Globe, and Black-Fryers. By his Maiesties Servants. VVritten by Richard Brome. Brome, Richard, d. 1652?
[92] p.
Printed by Aug. Mathevves, and are to be sold by Nicholas Vavasour, dwelling at the little south dore of St. Pauls Church, London : 1632.
